description:
Bailey trains two Bellossom call Bella and Belle, to perform a number of dance and acrobatic moves for the audience. Before the Pok√©mon Exibition in Florando, Bailey was trying to get her two Bellossom to perfect a backflip move she called the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop".
To complete the "Bell-Loop-de-Loop" Belle would launch Bella into the air who then completed a number of spins before landing on its feet.
name: Hikaru
